GSD.description:
phonet/pep: refuse to enable an unbound pipe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.89 by commit 52ad5da8e316fa11e3a50b3f089aa63e4089bf52. For more details please see the references link.
